column8: Hadi Awang admitted to hospitalimage: http://www.thestar.com.my/~/media/online/2...01F92794E3B668C PETALING JAYA: PAS president Datuk Seri Abdul Hadi Awang (pic) has been admitted to the hospital in Kuala Lumpur to receive intensive treatment Monday.PAS secretary Dr Ahmad Samsuri Mokhtar said in a statement that more updates on the Marang MP's condition will be released when needed.He thanked the public on behalf of the family and the party for giving Hadi space to recuperate by not visiting him at the hospital for the time being."PAS invites all members and supporters to pray for his health and that for treatment to go well," he said.TAGS / KEYWORDS:Read more at http://www.thestar.com.my/news/nation/2017...tyhGmpAA3I4E.99
time up,  going to claim 72 virgin soon
This time no bomoh to help already
if he die, his PAS kaki will continue his legacy?
